name: The Werewolf Hills - Demo
description:
The Werewolf Hills is a adventure-first person shooter where your objective is to arrive to the radio tower and call for help, but before you will need to pass over dangerous sectarians and a fierce werewolf that lies in the nights.

In this demo you will have to pass over an abandoned village fully of dangerous dark priests and discover the mystery that are in those hills.

In the game, you will have to find multiple types of weapons also grenades and medkits for stay alive as you go forward.

INPUT

  • [WASD] - Control Player
  • [Left Shift] - Run
  • [E] - Interact
  • [1][2][3] - Change Weapon
  • [L] - Lantern
  • [ESC] - Pause
  • [R] - Reload
  • [Left Mouse] - Shoot

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

OS:  Windows 7, 8, 10  (64 Bit)
Processor:  2.4 GHz multi-core
Memory:  4 GB RAM
Video: NVIDIA GeForce 980 | AMD Radeon HD
DirectX: Version 11.0
Storage: 1 GB available space
